Marked Territory

 MERLOT Merlot is a full-bodied goofball. She has a hint of a bite, but only in a silly, playful way. And when you really get to know her, sheâ€™ll have you wanting some of her time every night.
 PENNY Penny is my trail running buddy, she always stays nearby and is incredibly well trained. She loves doing tricks for treats, and knows her limits very well.
 HOLLY Holly can be kind of shy when she first meets new dogs, but once she warms up she loves to run around and play. She also loves people, so be careful, she may choose you over your dog!
 BARNEY Barney is pretty new to us, but has proven to us that he loves other dogs sometimes more than us. We would love to socialize him with dogs who can show him how to be a good boy.
